alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 14 at 2:16PM PST until December 15 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...For the High Wind Warning, highway 31 from Summer Lake to Valley Falls, highway 395 north and Highway 140 east of Lakeview, highway 299 east of Alturas, and higher elevations of the Warner Mountains and Winter Rim area. For the Wind Advisory, highway 31 just north of Summer Lake through Silver Lake, highway 139 south of Newell, highway 395, east of Alturas to Lakeview and portions of highway 140 including the city of Adel. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 7 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to be strongest from around 12 pm until 5 pm PST. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County
